title: CamTelCodes
description:
Visiting Cambodia or Angkor Wat and planning to use Local SIM card to cut down roaming cost? or Are you one of those Cambodian mobile subscribers who use more than one SIM card and have a hard time remembering short codes? Either scenario, this app will help you make the transition to the new mobile network easily and effortlessly. CamTelCodes or Cambodia Telecom Codes contains all the basic codes (short codes, ussd codes and dial codes) that will make you up and running in the new mobile network immediately by providing you with codes such as: call center number, top up code, balance check up code, idd code, internet/mms apn, data bundle registration code, call forward activation code, private number activation code, ringbacktone code, credit transfer code and also each mobile network's contact information. Whichever one of the 7 Mobile Networks you use, you can find all of their information and codes in this one app.

NOTE
- This app does not support USSD code query so you cannot query balance using USSD codes

FEATURES
- Support 2 Languages: English and Cambodian (Khmer)
- Mobile Network Support: Beeline, Hello, Metfone, Mfone, Mobitel, Smart and QB
- Dial Number Directly Within The App (iPhone Only)
- Sending SMS Directly Within The App (iPhone Only)
- Copy USSD Codes and Text to Clipboard for passing into Phone App (iPhone Only)
